title: Amir Muqam applauds forces for eliminating 19 militants in Orakzai
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 08 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs, Gilgit-Baltistan, and SAFRON, Engineer Amir Muqam, on Wednesday commended the security forces for successfully neutralizing 19 militants allegedly backed by India during an operation in Orakzai.
In his statement, he offered heartfelt tribute to the martyrs who laid down their lives for peace and stability, honoring Lieutenant Colonel Junaid Tariq Shaheed, Major Tayyab Rahat, and other valiant heroes who made the ultimate sacrifice.
The minister expressed deep sympathy for the families of the martyred heroes, offering prayers for the elevation of their ranks in the hereafter and wishing a swift recovery for the injured soldiers.
He stated that the unwavering courage, heroism, and sacrifice of Pakistan Armyâ€™s brave soldiers will be etched in history with golden words.
